name: HD Skin Hydra Glow Hydrating Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is:...Coverage:..Finish:..Formulation:..Highlighted Ingredients:...Ingredient Callouts:...What Else You Need to Know:...Clinical Results:...
ingredients: -Hydra-Skin Booster Complexu2122: Mimics the hydrating effect of a sheet mask...Aqua (Water), Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, C13-15 Alkane, Isododecane, Propanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Pentylene Glycol, Heptyl Undecylenate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride, C18-21 Alkane, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Undecane, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Tridecane, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Hexyl Dimethicone, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Phytate, Citric Acid, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Sodium Hydroxide, Algin, Galactoarabinan, Levulinic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Levulinate, Tocopherol, Maltodextrin, Biosaccharide Gum-1, [+/-Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Prep skin with your favorite skincare or preferred primer. .-Apply two pumps directly onto the center of your brush or back of the hand. .-Starting at the center of the face, apply in a downward motion toward the jawline and buff into the skin for an even application. .-For extra coverage, dampen your HD Skin Foundation Sponge (sold separately) with water or a hydrating setting spray, lightly tapping the foundation onto the face until desired level of coverage has been achieved. ..Pro Tip: .-Mix in a few drops of your favorite hydrating primer or face oil for a luminous, sheer-tint finish.  .-Spray Mist & Fix (sold separately) onto prepped skin and your favorite sponge as a priming spray and press into the skin prior to applying foundation for extra hydration and even longer wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. The colour matches my skin tone perfectly, and it is so easy to blend. A little goes a long way. I usually build up the areas of redness and have great coverage.

reviews.review_title: Would give a 4.5 if I could

reviews.review_text: Definitely one of the best foundations Iu2019ve ever tried and one of the best u201cyour skin but betteru201d foundations on the market. It does everything it claims to do, provided that you know how to work with it. It can sometimes react badly with moisturizer or primer and break up easily. With a little bit of getting used to it is worth the slightly above average price tags.

reviews.review_text: Love it! Makes my skin look glowy and soft! It also doesnt separate, which I love. This has replaced my Dior backstage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t typically write reviews but I am obsessed with this foundation. It goes on and blends so smoothly. It blurs pores and photographs well. There is no filter on my photo I added. Feeling is so light you forget you have anything on. It stays all day. I havenu2019t tried with any primers only my skincare serums/ moisturizer. I use the make up forever setting powder over top. It does so well on my late 30u2019s skin. Doesnu2019t cake in fine lines. Highly recommend itu2019s become my everyday choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i doubted this would work for my sensitive, combo skin. I purchased the mini to try it and just loved it! It's med coverage, glowy finish and long lasting. I like the formula because it's super hydrating without feeling wet/tacky on the skin. I've been wearing this everyday while transitioning from fall and winter. purchased the full size and I'm going to continue using it. I set my tzone with translucent powder and I'm good for 8+ hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: I should have never doubted MUFE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I realized MUFE changed their formula again, I decided to go searching for another foundation. I did my research; I watched countless videos from beauty influencers on their favorites. I created a list and swatched for an hour while in store. I tried about 10 different brands out - did side by side comparisons for over a week, only to come back to MUFE. It is the only foundation I found that truly melts into my skin and does not separate or look cakey throughout the day. I have oily skin, so it seems like a hydrating foundation is not a good choice for me, however, I really prefer a natural look over a matte look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went into the store asking for a long lasting full coverage and was color matched to this and love it. I have combo skin and this will last on me for a 10 hour shift

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin

Usually I would be a little yellow or a little red, so I eventually started buying two shades and mixing them. I wish they could include this shade in the other lines and the travel size too.

Fortunately, it did not break me out, and that says something about the ingredients bc I hv sensitive skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1R02 - Cool Alabaster - for fair skin with rosy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found my holy grail foundation. I love how lightweight it feels on my skin. I struggle with adult acne but my skin is more on the dry side. Most high coverage foundation are quite matte so they tend to make me look very dry. This gives me a natural look while covering all my redness and almost all my acne.  1R02 is a close match and actually had to mix 1R02 with 1N00 to get a perfect match. A huge thank you to the person commenting about the shade 1R00 that exist but is not available at Sephora. I went and got 1R00 directly from Make Up For Ever and it is a perfect match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

ITS SO GOOD, I love a NATURAL finish and this blends into my skin like there is no foundation at all but gives you that coverage, i canu2019t even feel it on my face (great if you donu2019t like the heavy feeling). NOTHING BAD TO SAY I LOVE IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bring back Reboot. This foundation makes my skin dry and flaky. Stop messing with a good product.

reviews.review_title: No more MUFE for me. Done.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well, it seems MUFE just really dislikes their customers that they have to keep messing with a good thing to the point of turning loyal customers away towards other brands. Which is exactly what I am doing with this latest iteration. I've been a loyal MUFE fan for going on 20 years now, and the OG HD was just the absolute best. Been thru what...4 versions of the HD now? The last being the Reboot.  I didn't even know they were discontinuing it until i went to reorder the other day. So this Hydra Glow is taking its place. Schlepped into Sephora thinking I should get a good color match, being as I've used the same shade since forever. Nope. Not even close. In fact, NONE of the shades seemed appropriate. I'm donE with MUFE, which really makes me sad becasue they HAD (past tense) really great foundations. Why they keep messing with it is beyond me. This new one is just a hard no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the Reboot foundation and when that was replaced with this, I figured it would pretty much be the same. The colour matching and coverage was very similar but the extra u201cHydra Glowu201d was a bit too much. I found this foundation to feel heavier on my skin and sit on-top of it. I started having to use a setting powder just to not feel slick and that I could run my finger over my skin and leave trail. On its own this foundation is definitely not transfer proof and has to be set, even when applied lightly. I wonu2019t be repurchasing this which is unfortunate because I liked everything except for the too heavy feeling. I would describe my skin as prone to dryness but well moisturized. This isnu2019t a foundation for oily prone people.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 3R44  - Cool Amber - for medium to tan skin with rosy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great formula!  Iu2019m not sure I was matched to a wrong shade at Sephora or this foundation oxides way too quickly. The Sephora store lights made it look like a match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation seamlessly applied each time, whether I used a beauty blender or brush. I have combination skin and prefer matte or natural finishes. But was pleasantly surprised at the dewy, glowy finish. I think the fornula is great because it doesnt stay wet/sticky on your skin. It's weightless and also looks like your skin. I did have to powder my T zone after 3-4 hours, and noticed the foundation separating around my nose and chin. Didnt have any skin reactions with this foundation. Because my skin is on the oily side, I'd prefer to use this in the winter versus warmer seasons. Overall, would recommend if you love the luminous, glowy look.

reviews.review_title: Only for people with perfect skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the worst foundations. If you have perfect skin, then sure it would probably look great.   Clings to dry patches, adds years to my face, thereu2019s no longevity, and looks so textured and bad on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say this foundation is pretty long-wearing and has a beautiful glow to it, but it broke me out. I found it gave me some closed comedones sadly. The other issue I had with it was it would get very patchy under my nose, but only under my nose. Definitely not transfer-proof (which it doesnu2019t claim to be). I wish it worked out for me, as it is a very beautiful foundation. I just didnu2019t like finding new breakouts every time I took it off at the end of the night. So, this would probably be perfect for someone with dry/combination non acne-prone skin.

I have oily acne prone skin, but wow this looks fantastic on the skin. I do have to set with powder, but it looks great all day.  I do

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Stays in place and gave great coverage and looked perfect in my photoshoot

reviews.review_title: Looking like glass skin (even with acne)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: With the trends of having glass skin or second skin, this is a wonderful choice. For reference I have dry, acne, and sensitive skin this has never pilled or settled into my pores. From my experience it does not break me out since itu2019s non-comedogenic. Also itu2019s so lightweight, and the coverage is buildable.

reviews.review_title: A great option for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been excited to try this one given the skin care ingredients and it's suitability for dry, sensitive types as most foundations irritate my skin.   Applied first with only my fingers, it did highlight dry spots. But, blending it with a Beauty Blender smoothed everything out. The Sephora Shade Finder nailed it in helping me to find a color match and I appreciate the range of shades offered. It's also quite concentrated requiring little product to achieve medium coverage making it more than worth the cost given how long I imagine a bottle will last.  All in all a great choice for truly sensitive skin or difficult shade matches though it may take a little more work application wise for truly dry skin.  I'll definitely be reaching for it on days I need more coverage and am glad I tried it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic lightweight dewy moisturizing finish. I absolutely love this foundation itu2019s a pretty thin formula (which is great a lil goes a long way, and itu2019s build able for those desiring more coverage,) although I really enjoy the lighter coverage.) It was so nice to finally find a foundation that doesnu2019t settle into lines and make my skin feel dehydrated (this keeps the hydration and glowing finish all day. Originally I ordered the wrong color and had to return , so before purchasing again I did a video consultation with a sweet lady from Makeup forevers website and she instantly helped me pick the right color to order on line from Sephora here, she was so kind and helpful. This will definitely be my go to foundation from now on from winter to summer itu2019s so versatile.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2N22  - Nude - for light to medium skin with neutral undertones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blends nicely. Dewy finish. Not enough coverage for me. Doesnu2019t build well. I think I couldu2019ve been matched a shade lighter. Not impressed.

reviews.review_title: Improves look of wrinkles excess glow looks sweaty
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This really make my dry skin look so much better and I wanted to love it. But here are my issues: 1.This wore like a light coverage foundation when I wanted medium to full coverage. It was patchy in coverage so I had to add several layers to even it out. (After using both, I highly advise a fluffy concealer brush and not a Beaty blender for this foundation. It helped a lot, but I still had to add way to many layers for coverage) 2.This product also had too much glow, so it made me look like I'd been sweating at the gym for hours.  3.I had to use a setting powder to hold it in place bc of all the layers and to dull down the oiliness. After about an hour of wear, all that shine was breaking through the powder again. Overall, trying to make this product work was exhausting. Please make this formula in a very slightly less shimmered option with fuller coverage. It's so close to being good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product, but it is by far the most disappointing foundation I've ever tried. I bought a neutral tone color, and it goes on super orange. Not ok. I could probably work with that somehow if the texture wasn't completely terrible. It settles in every line and pore and doesn't even last. I've tried using different primers, different application methods, everything I can think of and this foundation just sucks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this last winter and loved it while my skin was dry from winter. By summer it looked super greasy and oily on me. Would potentially purchase again but in a small size just to last the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got recommended this by a sephora employee and shade matched in store! I get so many compliments when i wear this foundation and it makes my skin look so clear and glowy!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over past few weeks i m loving this product. my skin feel dry to hydrated. I love this product. This is the one i was looking for from years. perfect for very dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a lover of the HD Skin foundation, I would say that this foundation is essentially the hydrating medium-coverage version. I personally love an airbrushed full coverage look, so if youu2019re like me you will be building the crap out of this foundation, that is, if you prefer a more dewy fresh look and opt to not set with any powders and just a setting/fixing spray it looks great. Setting this foundation with powders completely defeats the purpose of the Hydra-glo formulation which is interesting since my other u201cradiantu201d and u201cglowu201d foundations are able to withstand even a mattifying setting powder. Great makeup-skincare hybrid although there are more longwearing u201cglowu201d foundations on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating but sadly that is the only pro to this foundation and I had to return it. I have normal to dry skin and this made me look like a sweaty 7-11 hot dog even after setting with powder. This had the same amount of coverage as a tinted moisturizer but settled badly into lines and pores unlike my tinted moisturizers. It could possibly be used as a mix in to make more drying foundations more hydrating but for the price tag I couldn't do that

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the few foundation where it fit my pale skin correctly! The only downside that if youu2019re sweating or very oily, the oils and sweat will mess up the foundation (remove some or it will move around). Maybe a setting powder will work.

reviews.review_title: Why does foundation need to be scented????
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the look of this foundation but itu2019s mind-boggling to me that foundation would need to be scented. This is the first time Iu2019ve encountered this issue and Iu2019m so annoyed by the perfumey, headache-inducing

reviews.review_text: I bought the shade 1N00 and itu2019s way too light for me, but 1R02 and 1N06 are both too peachy/warm toned on me. I thought i was going to have to buy 1N00 and mix it with either 1R02 or 1N06u2026 but i just went on this brands website and it turns out they carry a shade 1R00 thatu2019s darker than 1N00 and still has that cool/pink undertone that i need without being too peachy. Unfortunately Sephora doesnu2019t sell this shade but s

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m really enjoying this foundation. I have dry, acne prone skin and this gives me the right amount of coverage without emphasizing texture. I also like that it feels hydrating and weightless. I use the other version of this which I love so much but this is starting to become my fave as well.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1N06 - Porcelain - for light skin with peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I have ever used. It does not separate around my nose (like most foundations). My skin looks like skin close up and far away! I have oily skin and find that this lasts all day and will not feel sticky if I set it with a good powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really happy with this! It's my first time using a liquid foundation (was using powder before), and I'm not going back! I like how dewy it is and the level of coverage for day to day use. I like the Ilia skin tint too, but felt that made me look too oily rather than dewy, and also made me break out. This doesn't have sunscreen but it sits well on my skin. Sometimes I add a bit of powder to set/mattify it slightly, but I have had a good experience so far for all day wear :)   For reference, I have dry/sensitive skin and am prone to eczema.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Great foundation u2014 but no neutral skin tones.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought I had found my HG foundation u2014 it is hydrating, doesnu2019t accentuate lines or wrinkles, looks natural but covers redness and blemishes, butu2026there are no actual neutral shades. I have truly neutral skin. Cool tones look too pink on me and warm tones look too yellow on me. Their neutral tones? Look orange/yellow on me. I guess I could start experimenting with mixing the supposedly neutral shades with cool shades to see if I could get an actually neutral shade. The shades also seem to be much darker than expected. I have neutral light-medium skin. Iu2019ve tried both the 1N14 (light skin) and the 2N22 (light-medium skin). The 1N14 is slightly light (I look just a bit ashy) when I first put it on, but dries darker. The 2N22 is waaayyy too dark. I look like I put on self-tanner. In both, I end up with a very pronounced line along my jaw. In the 1N14, it might only be because of the orangyness of it, not that it is too dark. If you can find a match for your undertone, this is a great foundation but they need to have actual neutral tones u2014 right now the only choices are warm or cool tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm going on 63 years old and didn't start wearing makeup until my 50's. It has taken me thousands of dollars to wade through all of the BB Creams, Tinted Moisturizers, Sunscreens and Foundations. I love the Chanel No1 Foundation but can't stand the fragrance in it and somewhere online, I came across someone stating that this MUF Hydra Glow is the perfect dupe.   As it turns out, I prefer it! It is so easy to apply with a brush or beauty blender and it blends beautifully with cream of powder products. I LOVE the vibrant glow (not shimmery) that it gives my skin and I actually get compliments on how beautiful my skin is, since I've been wearing it. I like a really natural finish that covers my sun damage but doesn't crease or dry out my skin. This is it!   It is definitely buildable for those who like more full coverage however, If you are someone that prefers a matte finish, you are probably not going to like this unless you powder it afterwards. I find it to be very adaptable, meaning I can powder down the finish and then add just a touch of glow with a finish spray or I can leave it on the dewier side.   I've tried other MUF foundations and none of them kept me coming back. I really hope MUF keeps this one in their line-up as I'm a fan for life!

I love the MUFE HD skin foundation but I have dehydrated skin so I thought a hydrating option would be great for really dry days but I didn't like this one. It didn't sit well on my skin at all, even right after applying. It didn't get very dry, but it broke up super quickly on my nose and wore off pretty badly on my nose and chin. Also I used Huda loose powder under my eyes and it really emphasized the texture on my nose and near my eyes where the powder touched this foundation. It wasn't the worst but also not very good. I would have given it a second chance to see if I could find a good way to work with it with the second half of my sample, but since it burned my face I won't try it again. I never had these kind of issues with the HD skin formula and I find it very easy going, I can use it with pretty much any skin prep and primer.

reviews.review_title: Worth trying but not my favorite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: APPEARANCE: Looks natural as advertised but if you have oilier skin it can look greasy in certain spots like the t-zone especially after long time of wear. Also I found this emphasized my pores and creased in my laugh lines. Not sure if different method of application would help that.   COVERAGE: Good coverage, not too heavy but hides dark spots relatively well.   DURABILITY: Lasts a pretty long time but I find it can get oily and and makes my pores more noticeable.   FEEL: Not as heavy as a high coverage foundation but heavier than I would have liked. I think I would prefer a more easily spreadable, more sheer formula. This is a bit thick and if you put on too much at once it can get sticky and hard to blend in.   SHADE SELECTION: Love the color options. I got matched in the store and found it suited me perfectly. I went for my neck/chest color since itu2019s a little lighter than my face.   OVERALL: Not bad and I can see this meeting some peoples needs. For me however, I felt it was uncomfortable to wear and the oily finish and increased visibility of my pores made me feel self conscious wearing it. Its not terrible but I would not recommend this or buy it again

reviews.review_title: Lightweight and skin-like, great for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, flaky skin so itu2019s difficult for me to find a foundation that provides adequate coverage but doesnu2019t emphasize texture or look patchy. One layer provides light coverage but it can easily be built up to medium coverage while still looking natural.  I would describe the finish as satin on my dry skin- not fully dewy yet not matte.  It can be applied with either a brush or sponge, but I prefer using a sponge because it distributes the foundation more evenly and avoids any streaks.  I got the shade 1R02 which leans more warm and peachy than rosy, but it still blends in well on my fair cool skin.  Even after six hours of wear, it doesnu2019t separate or cling to dry patches.  However, it does transfer unless it is set with powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried out the HD Skin Hydra Glow Skincare Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid, and it's safe to say that it has become a staple in my beauty routine. Let me break down my experience for you.  The first thing I noticed was the immediate transformation in the look and feel of my skin. The foundation delivered a radiant, healthy glow that made my complexion look brighter and more vibrant. It provided a natural finish that didn't appear overly dewy or greasy, giving my skin a fresh and revitalized appearance.  The finish of this foundation is impeccable u2013 it strikes a perfect balance between a luminous glow and a seamless, natural look. The coverage is buildable, allowing me to achieve anything from a sheer, everyday look to a more polished and flawless finish for special occasions. I was impressed by its long-lasting wear-time; it stayed in place throughout the day without settling into fine lines or wearing off unevenly.  The texture of the HD Skin Hydra Glow Foundation is luxurious and lightweight, making it a dream to apply. It effortlessly glided onto my skin, and I found it to be incredibly blendable. Whether using a brush, sponge, or fingertips, the foundation seamlessly merged with my skin, creating a smooth and even canvas. What stood out to me was the ease of use u2013 perfect for both makeup enthusiasts and those who prefer a quick and easy application.

reviews.review_text: I have combination skin. The foundation worked okay for my skin type. I felt like the t-zone area performed much better than the normal-dry perimeter. The foundation texture is somewhat runny.  Two pumps of foundation applied with a synthetic bristle foundation brush gives me a single layer coverage. This light layer gave me skin tint results that I loved for quick errand days: natural glow, even-complexion but I can still see my freckles and hyperpigmented areas. The foundation feels lightweight and dries to diffused glow-dewy finish. Three to four pumps provide medium to fuller coverage that covered up my freckles and hyperpigmentation with that latter amount providing a completely even complexion. My skin still feels like it can breathe and looks smooth. The finish is lightweight, dewy and radiant. Without a primer and touchup, the foundation wear-time was three hours. This foundation is not transfer-proof. I just used a light dusting of setting powder, and I was good to go. The foundation didn't break me out, and there isn't a perfume or heavy fragrance that I can detect.

reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try the Make Up Forever Hydra Glow Skin Care Foundation, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations. Disclaimer: I received this product in exchange for my honest review.  First and foremost, what sets this foundation apart is its radiant finish that doesn't cross the line into greasy or overly glittery territory, a common issue with many glow foundations. It strikes the perfect balance, giving a luminous glow without compromising on a natural look.  As someone with acne-prone, sensitive skin, and a fair share of texture and dark spots from old acne scars and stress, finding the right foundation is often a challenge. The Hydra Glow foundation, however, offers impeccable coverage without accentuating my skin's texture or pores. It's a true lifesaver for those minimal makeup days and equally stunning for a full glam look.  What impressed me the most is its ability to provide full coverage without the heaviness typical of other full coverage foundations. Despite having scars, this foundation feels lightweight and allows my skin to breathe. It seamlessly blends in, leaving my skin looking flawless, but more importantly, feeling comfortable.  I appreciate that it works effortlessly with both a brush and a sponge, offering versatility in application. No smudging or patchiness, just a smooth, even application that lasts throughout the day.  In conclusion, the Make Up Forever Hydra Glow Skin Care Foundation is a game-changer for those with acne, sensitivity, and textured skin like mine. It has become my go-to for achieving that my skin but better look, making it almost perfect. If you're on the lookout for a foundation that provides excellent coverage, a radiant finish, and feels weightless on the skin, this one's a must-try.

reviews.review_title: A game changer for radiant skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried out the Make Up Forever HD Skin HydraGlow Skin Care Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid, and I must say, it's been a game-changer for my makeup routine. This foundation not only offers excellent coverage but also provides nourishing skincare benefits that leave my skin looking radiant and hydrated. First and foremost, the coverage of this foundation is impressive. It effortlessly blurs imperfections, evens out skin tone, and gives a natural-looking finish. Whether I have blemishes, redness, or dark spots, this foundation has proven to be reliable in providing a flawless complexion without feeling heavy or cakey. One of the standout features of this product is the inclusion of hyaluronic acid. As someone with dry skin, I appreciate the hydrating properties this ingredient offers. The foundation glides on smoothly and never accentuates dry patches or fine lines. Instead, it leaves my skin feeling supple, plump, and refreshed throughout the day. The hyaluronic acid truly works wonders in providing a healthy, dewy glow that lasts. I also appreciate the lightweight formula of this foundation. It feels comfortable on the skin and allows for buildable coverage without ever looking or feeling overdone. I can easily achieve a natural, everyday look or amp it up for a more glamorous occasion without any hassle. Moreover, the longevity of this foundation is impressive. It stays put throughout the day, maintaining its fresh appearance without any significant fading or creasing. Even in humid weather or during long hours, it stands the test of time, which is a major plus for someone like me who is always on the go. The packaging is sleek and practical, featuring a pump dispenser that allows for easy and hygienic application. It also helps control the amount of product, preventing wastage. In terms of drawbacks, the only minor issue I encountered was the price as it falls into the higher price range. However, I certainly recommend it!
